mapper.select:
select
from dormmana LEFT JOIN admin on admin.adminid = dormmana.admin_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT studid,departname,major,sclass,grade,education,studname,studsex,studphone1,studphone2,adress,familyphone FROM students left join department ON students.departId = department.departid) as stu_depart on stu_depart.studid = dormmana.stud_id where stud_id = #{studId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select
from dormmana LEFT JOIN admin on admin.adminid = dormmana.admin_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT studid,departname,major,sclass,grade,education,studname,studsex,studphone1,studphone2,adress,familyphone FROM students left join department ON students.departId = department.departid) as stu_depart on stu_depart.studid = dormmana.stud_id
mapper.insert: insert into dormmana (stud_id, dormDesc, admin_id, signtime) values (#{studId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dormdesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{adminId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{signtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into dormmana
stud_id,
dormDesc,
admin_id,
signtime,
